resources.string: SELECT `hardware`.`har_id`, `hardware`.`har_seriennummer`, `hardware`.`har_beschreibung`, `hardware`.`har_bemerkung`, `schueler`.`sch_name`, `schueler`.`sch_vorname`, `kurs`.`kur_name` FROM `hardware` LEFT JOIN `historie` ON `historie`.`his_hardware` = `hardware`.`har_id` LEFT JOIN `schueler` ON `schueler`.`sch_id` = `historie`.`his_verliehen_an` LEFT JOIN `kurs` ON `kurs`.`kur_id` = `historie`.`his_kurs` ORDER BY `hardware`.`har_seriennummer`

SELECT `hardware`.`har_id`, `hardware`.`har_seriennummer`, `hardware`.`har_beschreibung`, `hardware`.`har_bemerkung`, `schueler`.`sch_id`, `kurs`.`kur_id`, MAX(`historie`.`his_datum_verleih`), `historie`.`his_datum_rueckgabe` FROM `hardware` LEFT JOIN `historie` ON `historie`.`his_hardware` = `hardware`.`har_id` LEFT JOIN `schueler` ON `schueler`.`sch_id` = `historie`.`his_verliehen_an` LEFT JOIN `kurs` ON `kurs`.`kur_id` = `historie`.`his_kurs` GROUP BY `hardware`.`har_id` ORDER BY `hardware`.`har_seriennummer`

SELECT `hardware`.`har_id`, `hardware`.`har_seriennummer`, `hardware`.`har_beschreibung`, `hardware`.`har_bemerkung`, `schueler`.`sch_id`, `kurs`.`kur_id`, MAX(`historie`.`his_datum_verleih`) FROM `hardware` LEFT JOIN `historie` ON `historie`.`his_hardware` = `hardware`.`har_id`
LEFT JOIN `schueler` ON `schueler`.`sch_id` = `historie`.`his_verliehen_an` LEFT JOIN `kurs` ON `kurs`.`kur_id` = `historie`.`his_kurs` WHERE `har_id` = \'%har_id%\' GROUP BY `hardware`.`har_id` ORDER BY `hardware`.`har_seriennummer`
SELECT * FROM `historie` WHERE `his_hardware` = \'%his_hardware%\' ORDER BY `his_datum_verleih` DESC
